tool_description:
This is the Learning API for the Integrated Virtual Learning Environment (IVLE) used by the National University of Singapore.

With this API, you will be able to access your course information on any platform that has internet access.

Usage of this API is governed by the NUS Acceptable Use Policy found at https://inetapps.nus.edu.sg/AUP/aup.htm
name: IVLE LAPI
title: IVLE LAPI

api_list.name: CommunityForum_ReplyPost
api_list.description: Replies to a posting

required_parameters.name: AuthToken
required_parameters.description: The authentication token generated by the login page. This determines the current user.

required_parameters.name: PostID
required_parameters.description: ID of the posting to reply

required_parameters.name: Title
required_parameters.description: Reply title

required_parameters.name: Message
required_parameters.description: Reply description

api_list.name: Community_CreateTask_JSON

required_parameters.name: AuthToken
required_parameters.description: The authentication token generated by the login page. This determines the current user.

required_parameters.name: ComID
required_parameters.description: Community ID

required_parameters.name: TaskName
required_parameters.description: Name of the Task

required_parameters.name: TaskDescription
required_parameters.description: Description of the task

required_parameters.name: ParentTaskID
required_parameters.description: Parent Task ID

required_parameters.name: TaskStatus
required_parameters.description: Status of the task

required_parameters.name: TaskPriority
required_parameters.description: Priortity of the task

required_parameters.name: TaskDueDate
required_parameters.description: Due Date of the task

api_list.name: MyOrganizer_AddPersonalEvent_JSON
api_list.description: Create a new Personal Event, returns the new event id (Json format)

required_parameters.name: AuthToken
required_parameters.description: The authentication token generated by the login page. This determines the current user.

required_parameters.name: EventTitle
required_parameters.description: Title of the personal event.

required_parameters.name: Venue
required_parameters.description: Venue of the personal event.

required_parameters.name: EventDateTime
required_parameters.description: DateTime of the event. Format

required_parameters.name: Description
required_parameters.description: Event description.

required_parameters.name: RecurType
required_parameters.description: N

required_parameters.name: strDays
required_parameters.description: list of days, delimited by commas. 1

required_parameters.name: RecurTillDate
required_parameters.description: Recur until which date. Format

api_list.name: StudentEvent_PostNewEvent_JSON
api_list.description: Post a new student event, returns the new event id (Json format)

required_parameters.name: AuthToken
required_parameters.description: The authentication token generated by the login page. This determines the current user.

required_parameters.name: CategoryID
required_parameters.description: Category to which the new event is posted. List of categories can be obtained from the StudentEvents_Categories function.

required_parameters.name: CommitteeID
required_parameters.description: Committee to which the new event is posted. List of committees can be obtained from the StudentEvents_Committees function.

required_parameters.name: Title
required_parameters.description: Title of the new event

api_list.name: Forum_PostNewThread_JSON
api_list.description: Post a new thread, returns the new thread id (Json format)

required_parameters.name: AuthToken
required_parameters.description: The authentication token generated by the login page. This determines the current user.

required_parameters.name: HeadingID
required_parameters.description: Heading to which the new thread is posted.

required_parameters.name: Title
required_parameters.description: Title of the new thread

required_parameters.name: Reply
required_parameters.description: Message body of the new thread

api_list.name: MyOrganizer_DeletePersonalEvent_JSON
api_list.description: Delete the Personal Event, returns a bool (Json format)

required_parameters.name: AuthToken
required_parameters.description: The authentication token generated by the login page. This determines the current user.

required_parameters.name: EventID
required_parameters.description: ID obtained from the [MyOrganizer_Personal] function.

required_parameters.name: DeleteAllRecurrence
required_parameters.description: Whether to delete all recurrence. Default is set to false. true
